snippet: São Paulo was awarded the Copa Sudamericana title after the Argentine club Tigre refused to play the second half of the second leg of the final in São Paulo.
abstract: Sao Paulo wins the Copa Sudamericana after Argentine soccer club Tigre refuses to take the field in the second half, accusing security officials of pulling guns on them and beating the players; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: São Paulo was awarded the Copa Sudamericana title after the Argentine club Tigre refused to play the second half of the second leg of the final in São Paulo.

headline.main: Club Refuses to Play Second Half of Final
headline.print_headline: Club Refuses to Play 2nd Half of Final
